Introducing the accessibility-alt-text-bot
Navigation Shortcuts in Issues React - Recommendation
Issues React - GA Readiness Kickoff
Introducing the accessibility-alt-text-bot

nodes.bodyText:
I'm happy we're bringing new tools to help us move accessibility forward. While the bot is indeed already teaching me that alt-test are mandatory, I wish we had an option to get this feedback immediately after the image upload. The fact we're getting pings from the bots after an action happens in causing some noise in my notifications 
I think @iansan5653 explored this via https://github.com/iansan5653/github-markdown-a11y-extension but it looks like there is a blocker to have this detection "live" (cf. iansan5653/github-markdown-a11y-extension#1).
Maybe in the future this could be something built-in into the markdown editor (and toggleable via an accessibility setting: "warn about missing alt-text on image uploads")

Sharing an example of the struggle I have with the bot was mentioned by another hubber here: #6231 (comment)

I do believe the github-actions bot has gone mad with power. I got a notification that brought me here to see its six comments saying Matt left out alt text.
The other day I was wondering about alt text for videos. How do we handle that. I saw @traumverloren adding a sub-line.

nodes.bodyText: @andrejusk and @jezcommits will be joining us starting Jan 22, lending their skills to our efforts also. Thanks @andrejusk and @jezcommits!
